publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3901 Patricia Ferguson: Operation Reclaim Awards—That the Parliament notes the successful staging of the Operation Reclaim Awards 2009; congratulates all those in receipt of awards whether in dance, cheerleading or football; notes the contribution of Sidekix Ltd, which delivers the programme to such effect throughout north Glasgow, and applauds Strathclyde Police and its partners for continuing to provide such important opportunities for Glasgow’s young people.
